H0.text: Whose mistress was Clara Petacci. Adolf Hitler

H1.text: Whose mistress was Clara Petacci. Benito Amilcare Andrea Mussolini's son

H2.text: Whose mistress was Clara Petacci. Galeazzo Ciano

H3.text: Whose mistress was Clara Petacci. Musilini

A4.text: Mussolini had several mistresses, among them Margherita Sarfatti and his final companion, Clara Petacci.

A5.text: Mussolini and his mistress Clara Petacci set out for Switzerland, intending to board a plane and escape to Spain.
